name: Splash De Baby
description:
Babies are lost in the big Mediterranean sea. Help the whales to save them! Single player or two players.

Global Game Jam 2017 entry.
http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/splash-de-baby

Credits:
Oren De-Panther Weizman - Programming
Shiri Blumenthal - Art Director
Shachar Bergman - UI/UX
Alon Kaplan - Music and SFX
Oded Kovach - SFX
Vered Shammash - Miscellaneous
